## LinkProps interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface LinkProps
```

## Properties

| Property                                                | Modifiers | Type      | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| ------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [children?](./extensions.linkprops.children.md)         |           | ReactNode | _(Optional)_ The content to be rendered inside the Link component.                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [openInNewTab?](./extensions.linkprops.openinnewtab.md) |           | boolean   | _(Optional)_ Boolean that indicates whether a link should be opened in new tab.                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [to](./extensions.linkprops.to.md)                      |           | string    | String that represents a valid path to the external or internal source. The relative path always starts with <code>/</code>, otherwise it's treated as an absolute path. Relative to the current directory path is not supported (ex. <code>subfolder</code>). |
| [tooltip?](./extensions.linkprops.tooltip.md)           |           | string    | _(Optional)_ String that is shown as tooltip on hover.                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
